item.title: KINGDOM HEARTS III + Re Mind (DLC)
item.description:
Title: KINGDOM HEARTS III + Re Mind (DLC)
Genre: Action , Adventure , RPG
Developer: Square Enix
Publisher: Square Enix
Franchise: KINGDOM HEARTS
Release Date: Jun 13, 2024




About This Game

Platform-exclusive Keyblade "Dead of Night" with purchase!



Sora is joined by Donald Duck and Goofy in a journey to stop the nefarious Organization XIII and reunite with his friends, Riku and Kairi. Through the power of positivity and friendship, Sora, Donald, and Goofy prevail against tremendous challenges and persevere against the darkness threatening iconic Disney and Pixar worlds.

Also includes Re Mind - the other side of the tale that unfolds during the climax of KINGDOM HEARTS III. In this additional chapter, Sora travels to the Keyblade Graveyard determined to rescue Kairi and discovers truths that he never could have imagined.
Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (ver.1909 or later)
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3330 / AMD Ryzen™3 1200
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 (VRAM 2GB) / AMD Radeon™ R7 260X (VRAM 2GB)
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 75 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 30FPS @1280×720
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (ver.1909 or later)
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-7500 / AMD Ryzen™3 3100
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon™ RX Vega 56
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 75 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 60FPS 1920×1080

item.title: KINGDOM HEARTS HD 2.8 Final Chapter Prologue
item.description:
Title: KINGDOM HEARTS HD 2.8 Final Chapter Prologue
Genre: Action , Adventure , RPG
Developer: Square Enix
Publisher: Square Enix
Franchise: KINGDOM HEARTS
Release Date: Jun 13, 2024




About This Game


Features 3 titles leading up to KINGDOM HEARTS III:

  • KINGDOM HEARTS Dream Drop Distance HD: A full-HD remaster. Sora and Riku take the Mark of Mastery exam in preparation for their coming showdown with Master Xehanort.
  • KINGDOM HEARTS χ Back Cover (movie): An HD movie that tells the mysterious story of the Foretellers from the series’ origins.
  • KINGDOM HEARTS 0.2 Birth by Sleep – A fragmentary passage – : A short episode that links to KINGDOM HEARTS III.

KINGDOM HEARTS Dream Drop Distance HD brings enhanced backgrounds for an even more gorgeous experience.


This game is available in two versions: Japanese and International.
Select your preferred language via the Steam launcher by right-clicking the title, then selecting "Properties" followed by "General".

NOTICE: Save data cannot be transferred between the Japanese and International versions.
Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 (VRAM 2GB) / AMD Radeon™ R7 260X (VRAM 2GB)
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 35 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 30FPS @1280×720
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (ver.1909 or later)
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-7500 / AMD Ryzen™ 3 3100
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon™ RX Vega 56
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 35 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 60FPS @1920×1080

item.title: KINGDOM HEARTS -HD 1.5+2.5 ReMIX-
item.description:
Title: KINGDOM HEARTS -HD 1.5+2.5 ReMIX-
Genre: Action , Adventure , RPG
Developer: Square Enix
Publisher: Square Enix
Franchise: KINGDOM HEARTS
Release Date: Jun 13, 2024




About This Game


KINGDOM HEARTS -HD 1.5+2.5 ReMIX- is an essential collection of the first six stories in the KINGDOM HEARTS series, a collaboration between Disney and SQUARE ENIX. Wield the legendary Keyblade and unlock the true power of friendship as you explore Disney worlds and defend them from darkness.

  • KINGDOM HEARTS FINAL MIX
  • KINGDOM HEARTS Re:Chain of Memories
  • KINGDOM HEARTS II FINAL MIX
  • KINGDOM HEARTS 358/2 Days (HD cutscene compilation)
  • KINGDOM HEARTS Birth by Sleep FINAL MIX
  • KINGDOM HEARTS Re:coded (HD cutscene compilation)

Enhanced backgrounds make this collection more stunning than ever before. Start your KINGDOM HEARTS journey now!


This game is available in two versions: Japanese and International.
Select your preferred language via the Steam launcher by right-clicking the title, then selecting "Properties" followed by "General".

NOTICE: Save data cannot be transferred between the Japanese and International versions.
Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (ver.1909 or later)
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-3210 / AMD A8-7600
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750 / AMD Radeon™ RX 460
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 60 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 30FPS @1280×720
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (ver.1909 or later)
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-3210 / AMD A8-7600
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750 / AMD Radeon™ RX 460
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 60 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 60FPS @1920×1080

item.title: Deep Rock Galactic - Order of the Deep Pack
item.description:
Title: Deep Rock Galactic - Order of the Deep Pack
Genre: Action
Developer: Ghost Ship Games
Franchise: Coffee Stain Publishing
Release Date: Jun 13, 2024




About This Content

When you bear the armor of the Order of the Deep, you represent this mighty guild as generations of graybeards have done before you. Let your pickaxe pierce with the Order's might, and claim the depths -- for Rock and Stone.

This DLC includes the following:

  • The 'Order of the Deep' Armor Framework for all four classes
  • The 'Order of the Deep' Armor Paintjob for all other armor sets
  • The 'Order of the Deep' Weapon Paintjob
  • The 'Order of the Deep' Pickaxe Paintjob
  • The 'Order of the Deep' Bosco Framework (with/without helmet)
  • The 'Order of the Deep' Bosco Paintjob

NOTE: This DLC is cosmetic only. It won't make you better at the game in any way. But it sure will make you look cool.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Violence, Use of Alcohol, Strong Language



System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS *: Windows 7 64 Bit
    • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5770 /w 1GB VRAM
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
    • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core

item.title: THE FINALS - Season 3 Starter Pack
item.description:
Title: THE FINALS - Season 3 Starter Pack
Genre: Action , Free to Play
Developer: Embark Studios
Release Date: Jun 13, 2024




About This Content

The Season 3 Starter Pack bundle includes:

- 3 Legendary Weapon Skins
- Season 3 Sticker
- 1 150 Multibucks

AI Generated Content Disclosure

The developers describe how their game uses AI Generated Content like this:

During the development process, we may use procedural- and AI-based tools to assist with content creation. In all such cases, the final product reflects the creativity and expression of our own development team. Examples include voiceover audio where we utilize text-to-speech tools to e.g. generate the audio of our in-game commentators Scotty & June.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10 or later 64-bit (latest update)
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen R5 1600 processor
    • Memory: 12 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 580
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 10 or later 64-bit (latest update)
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 processor
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
